name: B-LEAP
description:
B-LEAP is a survival game where everything is a bouncy ball!
In B-LEAP you use trampolines to leap around the stage collecting coins to buy upgrades (and if you get unlucky some downgrades)!

**NOTE** This game was made for the GMTK 2020 game jam, the theme was out of control.


To play B-LEAP you launch your player's head first into enemies.  To kill a enemy you have to hit it with your arrow head / sword.
To place trampolines, left click anywhere and a trampoline will spawn in your direction.
You can fill your special meter up by getting enemies inside of the circle around the player, as well as bouncing of your trampolines.
At the end of each round, click on the button underneath the continue button to buy upgrades (or downgrades) using the coins you get by killing enemies.


Codist - Programming, some sprites.
Gato - Music and SFX, sprites.
Toonn - A little sprites.
YouTube Stream Chat - Ideas and motivation.
